Package stork.feather.util

Utility classes for testing and integrating Feather modules.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AggregatorSink
    A Sink which aggregates multiple, randomly-ordered Slices into a single Slice which it rings a bell with on finalization.
    Crawler<T>
    A Crawler operates on a Resource tree recursively.
    HexDumpSink
    A Sink which prints a hexadecimal representation of incoming data to an OutputStream or, by default, to #System.out.
    LocalSession
    A session capable of interacting with the local file system.
    Resources
    A utility class for creating anonymous Resources.
    Resources.Anonymous
    A base class for anonymous Resources.
    StringTap
    An anonymous Tap which emits the string representation of an object via a SliceTap
    Taps
    A utility class for creating anonymous Taps for various purposes.

Package stork.feather.util Description

Utility classes for testing and integrating Feather modules. These classes are meant to simplify the integration of non-Feather code with existing Feather modules, for creating test cases, or producing placeholders for works in progress. In general, these classes should not be used directly by finished Feather implementations.
